attributes.action: Ban polystyrene trays from chip shops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After being on holiday the amount of polystyrene waste left in overflowing bins that is not recyclable is unbelievable.
I asked for mine to be in paper and was told no.
As we are trying to save the planet and to recycle as much waste as possible instead of killing the planet and filling up landfill,please can you see your way to the banning of polystyrene double trays and to have fish and chips in paper.You encourage us not to fill landfill so please ban this amount of un recyclable material and replace it with something that can be like paper or a recyclable card.
